meanings.definition: The time during which something continues.
meanings.sent1: The duration of the movie was two hours.
meanings.sent2: I can only play for a short duration before dinner.
meanings.sent3: The duration of the meeting felt like an eternity.
meanings.sent4: The duration of the storm seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The duration of the test was so long that I fell asleep.

meanings.definition: The length of time that something lasts.
meanings.sent1: The duration of the concert was three hours.
meanings.sent2: The duration of the battery life depends on usage.
meanings.sent3: The duration of the game surprised everyone with its brevity.
meanings.sent4: The duration of the journey felt like a lifetime.
meanings.sent5: The duration of the class seemed to drag on forever.
